title: Deep Learning and Anatomical Knowledge Integration Design for Dental CBCT Image Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of medical imaging processing, deep learning concepts, and mathematical optimization theory
context.additional_context: Training program for AI solution research teams developing automated dental diagnostic technologies

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain the Dense U-Net model structure reflecting anatomical constraints.
Learners will be able to apply mathematical optimization techniques to medical image segmentation problems.
Learners will be able to design data preprocessing strategies to enhance CBCT lesion detection performance.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
